verses.verse: For <WG1063> as <WG3303> touching <WG4012> the ministering <WG1248> to <WG1519> the saints <WG40>, it is <WG2076> <WG5748> superfluous <WG4053> for me <WG3427> to write <WG1125> <WG5721> to you <WG5213>:

For <WG1063> I know <WG1492> <WG5758> the forwardness of <WG4288> your <WG5216> mind <WG4288>, for which <WG3739> I boast <WG2744> <WG5736> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> to them of Macedonia <WG3110>, that <WG3754> Achaia <WG882> was ready <WG3903> <WG5769> a year <WG4070> ago <WG575>; and <WG2532> your <WG5216> zeal <WG2205> <WG1537> hath provoked <WG2042> <WG5656> very many <WG4119>.

Yet <WG1161> have I sent <WG3992> <WG5656> the brethren <WG80>, lest <WG3363> our <WG2257> boasting <WG2745> of <WG5228> you <WG5216> should be in vain <WG2758> <WG5686> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> behalf <WG3313>; that <WG2443>, as <WG2531> I said <WG3004> <WG5707>, ye may be <WG5600> <WG5753> ready <WG3903> <WG5772>:

Lest <WG3381> haply <WG4458> if <WG1437> they of Macedonia <WG3110> come <WG2064> <WG5632> with <WG4862> me <WG1698>, and <WG2532> find <WG2147> <WG5632> you <WG5209> unprepared <WG532>, we <WG2249> (that <WG3363> we say <WG3004> <WG5725> not <WG3363>, ye <WG5210>) should be ashamed <WG2617> <WG5686> in <WG1722> this same <WG5026> confident <WG5287> boasting <WG2746>.

Therefore <WG3767> I thought <WG2233> <WG5662> it necessary <WG316> to exhort <WG3870> <WG5658> the brethren <WG80>, that <WG2443> they would go before <WG4281> <WG5632> unto <WG1519> you <WG5209>, and <WG2532> make up beforehand <WG4294> <WG5661> your <WG5216> bounty <WG2129>, whereof ye had notice before <WG4293> <WG5772>, that the same <WG5026> might be <WG1511> <WG5750> ready <WG2092>, <WG3779> as <WG5613> a matter of bounty <WG2129>, and <WG2532> not <WG3361> as <WG5618> of covetousness <WG4124>.

But <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say, He which soweth <WG4687> <WG5723> sparingly <WG5340> shall reap <WG2325> <WG5692> also <WG2532> sparingly <WG5340>; and <WG2532> he which soweth <WG4687> <WG5723> bountifully <WG1909> <WG2129> shall reap <WG2325> <WG5692> also <WG2532> bountifully <WG1909> <WG2129>.

Havahry man <WG1538> according as <WG2531> he purposeht <WG4255> <WG5736> in his heart <WG2588>, so let him give; not <WG3361> grudgingly <WG1537> <WG3077>, or <WG2228> of <WG1537> necessity <WG318>: for <WG1063> 'Elohim <WG2316> loveth <WG25> <WG5719> a cheerful <WG2431> giver <WG1395>.

And <WG1161> 'Elohim <WG2316> is able <WG1415> to make <WG4052> all <WG3956> grace <WG5485> abound <WG4052> <WG5658> toward <WG1519> you <WG5209>; that <WG2443> ye, always <WG3842> having <WG2192> <WG5723> all <WG3956> sufficiency <WG841> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> things, may abound <WG4052> <WG5725> to <WG1519> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041>:

(As <WG2531> it is written <WG1125> <WG5769>, He hath dispersed abroad <WG4650> <WG5656>; he hath given <WG1325> <WG5656> to the poor <WG3993>: his <WG846> righteousness <WG1343> remaineth <WG3306> <WG5719> for <WG1519> ever <WG165>.

Now <WG1161> he that ministereth <WG2023> <WG5723> seed <WG4690> to the sower <WG4687> <WG5723> both <WG2532> minister <WG5524> <WG5659> bread <WG740> for <WG1519> your food <WG1035>, and <WG2532> multiply <WG4129> <WG5659> your <WG5216> seed sown <WG4703>, and <WG2532> increase <WG837> <WG5659> the fruits <WG1081> of your <WG5216> righteousness <WG1343>;)

Being enriched <WG4148> <WG5746> in <WG1722> every thing <WG3956> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> bountifulness <WG572>, which <WG3748> causeht <WG2716> <WG5736> through <WG1223> us <WG2257> thanksgiving <WG2169> to 'Elohim <WG2316>.

For <WG3754> the administration <WG1248> of this <WG5026> service <WG3009> not <WG3756> only <WG3440> supplieth <WG2076> <WG5748> <WG4322> <WG5723> the want <WG5303> of the saints <WG40>, but <WG235> is abundant <WG4052> <WG5723> also <WG2532> by <WG1223> many <WG4183> thanksgivings <WG2169> unto 'Elohim <WG2316>;

Whiles by <WG1223> the experiment <WG1382> of this <WG5026> ministration <WG1248> they glorify <WG1392> <WG5723> 'Elohim <WG2316> for <WG1909> your <WG5216> professed <WG3671> subjection <WG5292> unto <WG1519> the gospel <WG2098> of Moshiach <WG5547>, and <WG2532> for your liberal <WG572> distribution <WG2842> unto <WG1519> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> men;

And <WG2532> by their <WG846> prayer <WG1162> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, which long after <WG1971> <WG5723> you <WG5209> for <WG1223> the exceeding <WG5235> <WG5723> grace <WG5485> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1909> you <WG5213>.
<WG1161> Thanks <WG5485> be unto 'Elohim <WG2316> for <WG1909> his <WG846> unspeakable <WG411> gift <WG1431>.
